name: Rover There
description:
This game was made for VimJam 2020, which was a week long game jam. But i only used about 2-3 days worth of time, beacuse of some unexpected IRL stuff which came in the way.

THIS GAME IS NOT AT ALL NEAR COMPLETE.

Story:

You play as 1 (or 2) astronauts which has been stranded on an unknown planet, and need to collect parts for there vehicle which they lost in the crash which stranded them on the planet. The crash was caused by a collision with a spaceship filled with Monkeys and Guns. 

The story was supposed to be incorperated in the game with a small intro/slideshow, but i had to cut it because i did not have enough time.

Sprites: 

Background is a colormodified version of Trixie's  stringstar fields background. (https://trixelized.itch.io/starstring-fields)

The metal tiles is heavely inspired by 0x72's 16x16 Robot Tileset.

(https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-robot-tileset)

The rest of the sprites is made by me during the jam in Photoshop with colors from lospec.

Fonts:

Pixel fonts by Kenney. 

(https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts)
